settings.title: Lessons from the Trenches
settings.text: KetoBrownie (now rebranded as Sinless Snacks - https://www.sinlesssnacks.com/) started where a lot of great food brands start - in the founder’s kitchen. Nick Raccuia’s story is a great one, full of insights and inspiration, successes and failures. It includes nailing product development on a few products and failure with other products

settings.title: Meet Nick Raccuia of KetoBrownie in East Boston
settings.text:
Today we’d like to introduce you to Nick Raccuia.

So, before we jump into specific questions about the business, why don’t you give us some details about you and your story.
A few years ago, I started researching ketogenic diets to help achieve my fitness goal of attaining a single digit body-fat percentage

settings.title: The 11 Best Keto Subscription Boxes Out Right Now
settings.text:
If you’re thinking of going keto, you may not be aware of all the work that goes into adhering to diet.

The keto diet is essentially following a high-fat, low-carb diet. The goal of the eating regimen is to get your body into a state known as ketosis. This refers to a metabolic situation in which your body relies on your

settings.title: The Capitalism Fund Update: Nick of KetoBrownie Traded His Books for an Oven and Never Looked Back
settings.text: Accountants are great with adding numbers, but what do they know about running a business? Nick Raccuia decided to find out for himself. After spending countless hours perfecting his recipe for a keto-friendly brownie in a cramped apartment kitchen, he knew it was time to share his

settings.title: Nick's super power is product development
settings.text: If you peek into Ryan’s pantry, you’re going to find boxes and boxes of Keto Brownie. When he first stumbled upon this snack, he probably didn’t know for sure that one day, he’d invest in the brand. But he was bullish on the founder, Nick Raccuia, and the product. So it surprised nobody when the Capit

settings.title: Eastie Resident Nick Raccuia Starts Brownie Company for Ketogenic Lifestyles
settings.text:
East Boston resident Nick Raccuia is on a mission to develop high quality and great tasting snacks for Ketogenic and low-carb diets.

And he is well on his way to reaching that goal, having founded KetoBrownie, a Boston-based nutrition company.

settings.title: The only Ketogenic-friendly brownie snack I endorse
settings.text:
Hello Jared, it is I, Daily Wire god-king Jeremy Boreing.
I want to tell you about Sinlass Snacks.
I’m not being paid to do this, by the way.
So, after receiving a box of Sinlass Snackss from a friend, I was so surprised by the quality that I decided to help them out—and help you out—by telling you about them.
